DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetic drug interaction Metformin Rosuvastatin healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetics Drug Interaction Between Metformin Rosuvastatin
DOC.detailed_description: Drug-drug Interaction Following Co-administration Metformin Rosuvastatin Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 19~55 year healthy male BMI measurement 19.0kg/m^2~ 28.0kg/m^2 Signed inform consent form participate voluntarily comply trial requirement . History clinically significant kidney , liver , gastrointestinal system , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , tumor blood disorder , nervous system , immune system , endocrine disorder , cardiovascular disease , mental disorder ( mood disorder , obsessivecompulsive disorder , etc . ) SBP > 140mmHg < 90mmHg , DBP > 90mmHg < 60mmHg . An impossible one participant clinical trial investigator 's decision include laboratory test result another reason . History drug abuse A alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 140g/week ) smoker ( cigarette > 10 cigarettes/day ) Hypersensitivity reaction history investigational drug specific drug ( aspirin , antibiotic ) Administrated investigational product previous clinical trial within 60 day screen day study . Administrated drug inhibit induce OCT2 , OATP1B1 transporter within 30 day screen day study . ( ex : proton pump inhibitor , rifampicin ) Glomerular filtration rate < 60mL/min Donated blood within 60 day prior screen day apheresis blood within 30 day prior screen day .
